item.description: [b]Update[/b] I will be at the theater by 6:50. We will head in to the theater at 7:10. The movie is at 7:20. This movie will be at the Kendall, and I'll be waiting at the balcony above the lobby with my red hat with the meetup logo. Just look up! Always a good idea to buy your ticket online... this url works, but be sure to change the date! https://tickets.landmarktheatres.com/Landmark.aspx?TheatreID=231 [b]Description[/b] From director Michael Radford comes FLAWLESS, a clever diamond-heist thriller set in swinging 1960s London. Demi Moore stars as female executive at the London Diamond Corporation that finds herself frustrated by a glass ceiling after years of faithful employment. She befriends a janitor (Michael Caine) who is reaching the end of his tenure at the company and is looking to help himself to a considerably more generous retirement package. Together they hatch a plot to steal a handful of priceless diamonds, setting off a swirling chain of events that send ripples all over Europe in this fast paced, stylish film. [b]Trailer[/b] [b]Website[/b] http://www.flawlessfilm.com/
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be standing at the balcony above the lobby wearing my red hat with the meetup logo. Just look up!
item.why: For the master Michael Caine, and one time highest-paid-actress-in-movies ($10 mil per pic!) Demi Moore. Come see if they've still got their chops in an old school heist picture. Also co-starring Lambert Wilson, the Merovingian in the Matrix sequels.
item.name: Flawless
